name: Hammer Nukem 3D
description:
VISIT THE WEST COAST STATE OF CALIFORNIA IN HAMMER NUKEM 3D
The city streets are packed with bad guys. Who you gonna call? That's right, it's THE HAMMER. He'll straighten them out with his shotgun.
Join The Hammer in 30 action packed missions in his never-ending quest to defeat his arch-nemesis over the City of Angels.
FEATURES
* 30 missions
* Visually stunning updated graphics, character and vehicle models
* Controllable vehicles, like tanks, cars, helicopters and turrets!
* Multiple weapons
* Explosives
* Achievements
* A shop with awesome in-game features like GodMode, Golden Gun and a Jetpack!!
* Lots and lots of explosions!
* HD quality resolution
* Countless hours of gameplay
